query: best hotels in Los Angeles for women travelers
title: Best hotels in Los Angeles for women travelers: Safe, clean, and great amenities
excerpt: Finding hotels in Los Angeles that prioritize safety, cleanliness, and exceptional amenities for women travelers can be a daunting task. This list is invaluable as it highlights accommodations that not only meet these essential criteria but also provide a welcoming environment for solo female explorers. With so many options available, knowing where to stay can make all the difference in ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable trip.
intro: Discover the best hotels in Los Angeles specifically tailored for women travelers, focusing on safety, cleanliness, and outstanding amenities.

hotels.name: Pendry West Hollywood
hotels.description: Pendry West Hollywood is a luxurious 5-star hotel that combines elegance with modern amenities, featuring stylish rooms equipped with flat-screen TVs and some offering breathtaking mountain views from private balconies. Guests can savor gourmet dining with an eclectic menu that caters to various dietary needs, while the outdoor swimming pool, sun terrace, and fitness center provide ample opportunities for relaxation and recreation. Ideally situated near iconic attractions like the Dolby Theater and Capitol Records Building, this hotel promises an unforgettable stay in the heart of Los Angeles.
hotels.highlight: Offers luxurious rooms with private balconies, a gourmet restaurant, spa services, and an outdoor pool in a prime location.

hotels.name: The Beverly Hilton
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of luxury at The Beverly Hilton, where you can unwind by a stunning outdoor pool featuring a movie screen for memorable evenings. Enjoy convenient on-site dining options, stay active in the 24-hour gym, and indulge in rejuvenating treatments at the beauty salon. Our elegantly designed rooms come equipped with modern amenities such as flat-screen TVs and minibars, ensuring your comfort and relaxation throughout your stay.
hotels.highlight: Offers a stunning outdoor pool, on-site dining, a 24-hour gym, and rejuvenating beauty services for ultimate relaxation.

hotels.name: Kimpton Hotel Palomar Los Angeles Beverly Hills, an IHG Hotel
hotels.description: Experience luxury at Kimpton Hotel Palomar with newly renovated suites featuring spa baths, breathtaking city views, and spacious living areas. Enjoy amenities like in-room spa services and a daily wine tasting hour while relaxing by the outdoor pool. Conveniently located near Beverly Hills and UCLA, the hotel also offers free bicycle rentals for easy exploration of nearby attractions.
hotels.highlight: Offers newly renovated suites with spa baths, outdoor pool, in-room spa services, and daily wine tastings.

hotels.name: The Shay, a Destination by Hyatt
hotels.description: Experience unparalleled luxury at The Shay, a Destination by Hyatt in Los Angeles, featuring stylish air-conditioned rooms with modern amenities like flat-screen TVs and private bathrooms. Guests can take advantage of top-notch facilities, including a fitness center, restaurant, bar, and 24-hour room service, along with a relaxing shared lounge and terrace. Ideally located just 5 km from the Petersen Automotive Museum and near major attractions like the Los Angeles County Museum of Art and Venice Beach Boardwalk, The Shay promises a perfect blend of comfort and convenience for an unforgettable stay.
hotels.highlight: Boasts stylish air-conditioned rooms, a fitness center, rooftop garden, and 24-hour room service in a central location.

hotels.name: Hotel Figueroa, Unbound Collection by Hyatt
hotels.description: Hotel Figueroa is a luxurious retreat in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, featuring a tranquil outdoor pool and exquisite Mediterranean dining at Breva. Guests can unwind in elegantly designed rooms equipped with modern amenities, including high-speed WiFi and smart technology. With its prime location near the Microsoft Theatre and Staples Center, this independently owned hotel promises exceptional service and a memorable stay.
hotels.highlight: Hotel Figueroa offers a tranquil outdoor pool, gourmet dining, and elegantly designed rooms with modern amenities in a safe environment.

hotels.name: Casa Del Mar
hotels.description: Experience a luxurious oceanfront getaway at Casa Del Mar, where you can savor fresh seafood at Catch or enjoy small plates paired with live music at The Terrazza, all while taking in breathtaking ocean views. Each room boasts a hydrotherapy spa tub, floor-to-ceiling windows, and modern conveniences, ensuring a relaxing stay. With pet-friendly options and easy access to the vibrant 3rd Street Promenade, Casa Del Mar is the perfect destination for a memorable escape.
hotels.highlight: Casa Del Mar offers luxurious oceanfront accommodations with hydrotherapy spa tubs, floor-to-ceiling windows, and pet-friendly options.
